about_the_game:
Gourds up is a 2D shooter, with many roguelike-y elements. You will progress through runs by choosing the next rooms that you will fight in, allowing for more strategy during the run. Players will go through decks of cards fighting through many vegetable based enemies, to beat all of the bosses and achieve victory.

Get random weapons and upgrades, and just don't die!

Gameplay

As Cinnamon the Pumpkin you will be given sets of cards, which transport you to different hand crafted rooms full of enemies that you will have to beat all of to progress and reach harder and harder rooms. As you go through the runs you will find different types of weapons and gain different types of upgrades to make different loadouts and beat all of the bosses.

However, don't die, because doing so will send you straight back to the start.

Key Features
    Random Weapons
    Random Upgrades
    Random Room Choices
    Unique Bosses
    More strategy when choosing fights
    Weapon Combining

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 470
  • Sound Card: 5GB available space

name: Gourds Up

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (version 1607 or better)
  • Processor: 64bit 1.5 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 10 compliant graphics card and driver
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: TBA
  • Additional Notes: TBA
